globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https://eagle-bot-landing-service.azurewebsites.net; font-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://unpkg.com/mui@latest/dist/mui.min.css; frame-ancestors 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://eagle-bot-landing-service.azurewebsites.net; base-uri 'self'; report-uri 'none'; object-src 'none';
